name: Symphony
headline: Voice AI sims for next-gen employee training
description: Symphony helps enterprises train their customer-facing employees using interactive AI voice simulations of real-world scenarios. Users can create an infinite number of simulations that allow their teams to practice the job - avoiding costly mistakes with real customers. For example, we’re live with 2 of the top 3 auto insurers in NA, helping train 1000s of newly hired claims adjusters.

founders.name: Murtaza Ali, Founder
founders.description: Murtaza is Co-founder & CEO of Symphony. He is a 2nd-time founder, ex-McK EM, and was VP of Growth at Tractable taking them from $100M to $1B valuation in 2 years. He has experience building and selling AI solutions, closing multi-million ARR B2B Enterprise deals.

founders.name: Shobhit Srivastava, Founder
founders.description: Shobhit is the co-founder & CTO of Symphony. His background is in full stack engineering at hyper-growth startups. Most recently, he was a senior engineer/tech lead at Valon, an A16Z-backed mortgage fintech, leading engineering efforts for the billing vertical. He studied CS and AI at Georgia Tech.

generated_description:
### Overview of Symphony

**Mission**: Symphony is on a mission to revolutionize employee training through Voice AI simulations that equip teams for the challenges of customer interactions.

**Background**: Founded in 2024, Symphony began its journey focused on helping enterprises train their customer-facing employees. Instead of learning on the job—often with real customers and the risk of making costly mistakes—Symphony provides interactive AI voice simulations. These simulations create realistic scenarios where employees can practice their responses, ensuring they’re prepared before facing actual customers. They've already made a significant impact, partnering with two of the top three auto insurers in North America to train thousands of newly hired claims adjusters.

**Key Details**:
- **Location**: New York
- **Team**: Just a lean team of 2, which indicates a startup culture focused on agility and rapid development.
- **Advisory**: Backed by notable figures in the startup ecosystem, including David Lieb from Y Combinator, providing mentorship and support from one of the most respected accelerator programs.
- **Tags**: The company falls under several important tech categories such as artificial intelligence, SaaS, B2B, HR tech, and is part of the vibrant New York startup scene.

**Current Offerings**: Symphony's platform allows users to easily create endless AI simulations, making training flexible and effective. They emphasize a practical and engaging approach: “Stop practicing on your customers. Simulate real-world scenarios with the push of a button.”

**Website**: You can learn more or get in touch with them via their website at [getsymphony.co](https://getsymphony.co).

In short, Symphony is tackling an age-old problem in employee training with an innovative tech-driven solution. By leveraging AI, they’re not just streamlining the training process; they’re safeguarding customer relationships and boosting employee confidence. This is the kind of thinking that could reshape industries. Keep an eye on them—they’re just getting started.
